patthana16.30:1.1: Savitakkasavicāraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pannarasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.
patthana16.30:2.1_0: Savitakkasavicāraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto nanahetu dhammo
patthana16.30:2.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā
patthana16.30:2.1_2: ekūnavīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane ekūnavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
